sentence.Network_en: He tramped hurriedly round the lake towards the garden.
sentence.Network_cn: 他匆匆地迈着沉重的步伐绕过湖边向花园走去。

sentence.Network_en: The moment she saw it, she blushed and hurriedly left the room.
sentence.Network_cn: 她一看到这一幕就脸红了，连忙匆匆走出了房间。

sentence.Network_en: You hang up hurriedly and attend to baby, crockery, etc.
sentence.Network_cn: 你慌忙挂上电话,去照料孩子, 去收拾陶器, 等等.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 第一册英文单词表_新概念英语吧_百度贴吧 ... slowly ad. 缓慢地 hurriedly ad. 匆忙地 cut v. 割，切.
匆,匆字的解释,查字典 ... 匆忙[ hastily;in a hurry] 匆匆[ hurriedly;hastily] 匆猝[ hastily].
高中英语单词表 ... husband n． 丈夫 hurriedly ad. 仓促地，忙乱地 hurried a. 仓促的，慌忙的.
新概念英语第二册单词总汇_英语网 ... understanding n. 理解，领悟，谅解 hurriedly ad. 匆忙地，草率地 underwater a. 在水下的.

list.abs: 划_百度百科 ... [find] 寻觅;搜罗捞取 [scrawl;scribble hurriedly] 潦草书写 [calculate;weigh] 算计.
and hurriedly hid a large parcel under his desk ., 慌忙把一个大包藏到了桌子下面.
I hurriedly returned home and phoned fire station ., 我赶紧回家给消防队打电话.
The village have been hurriedly deserted , perhaps because terrorists is in the area ., 全村人都匆匆逃走了 , 或许因为该地区有恐怖分子.

entry.def: A hurried action is done quickly, because you do not have much time to do it in.

entry.tran: （行动）仓促的，突然的，急于应对的
entry.def: A hurried action is done suddenly, in reaction to something that has just happened.

example.ex: Downing Street denied there had been a hurried overnight redrafting of the text.
example.tran: 唐宁街否认连夜赶工改拟了文本。

entry.def: Someone who is hurried does things more quickly than they should because they do not have much time to do them.

example.ex: Parisians on the street often looked worried, hurried and unfriendly.
example.tran: 巴黎街上的路人往往看上去忧心忡忡、匆匆忙忙而且不太友善。

means.word_mean: 1. in a hurried or hasty manner;

sentences.sentence: "the way they buried him so hurriedly was disgraceful"
"sold in haste and at a sacrifice"

auth_sentence.content: Leather handbags are being hurriedly placed on plinths.
auth_sentence.res_content: Leather handbags are being hurriedly placed on plinths.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Leather handbags are being hurriedly placed on plinths.

auth_sentence.content: The father hurriedly agreed to go to a nearby diner instead.
auth_sentence.res_content: The father hurriedly agreed to go to a nearby diner instead.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The father hurriedly agreed to go to a nearby diner instead.

auth_sentence.content: I...hurriedly tidied my hair in the looking-glass.
auth_sentence.res_content: I...hurriedly tidied my hair in the looking-glass.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I...hurriedly tidied my hair in the looking-glass.

sentences.en: I wrote my mother a letter hurriedly.
sentences.cn: 我匆忙地给我母亲写了封信。

sentences.en: The man drew on his trousers hurriedly.
His spoken Arabic was hurriedly brushed up before he started for the Middle East.
sentences.cn: 他在动身去中东以前,把阿拉伯口语匆匆复习了一下。
